next_state: -= Kitchen =- Fancy seeing you here. Here, by the way, being the kitchen. You can see a fridge. The fridge contains a white onion, a raw white tuna, a yellow onion and a red onion. The counter is vast. On the counter you see a roasted red potato, a raw red tuna, a raw purple potato, a cookbook and a knife. You make out a stove. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?
